articles.description: Equipped with a tonne of new-age features, Mahindra has upped the ante for the XUV 3XO as a prime competitor in the compact SUV segment.
articles.content: Our roads are not just about long straight highways and congested city bits; in fact, a huge chunk of them are district and rural roads, and they are demanding when it comes to cars. Manufacturers ma… [+4170 chars]
